languages.text: {n}Тучный, роскошно разодетый мужчина кланяется вам — не без труда. Над его плечом жужжит сервочереп, пальцы аугментированной руки постукивают по стопке бумаг, а внимательный взгляд устремлен на вас сквозь линзу увеличительного импланта.{/n} "Мое почтение, Ваша Светлость! Янрис Данрок к вашим услугам".

{n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."
languages.original_text: {n}Тучный, роскошно разодетый мужчина кланяется вам — не без труда. Над его плечом жужжит сервочереп, пальцы аугментированной руки постукивают по стопке бумаг, а внимательный взгляд устремлен на вас сквозь линзу увеличительного импланта.{/n} "Мое почтение, Ваша Светлость! Янрис Данрок к вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: {n}A corpulent man in lavish clothes before you bows, which is not easy for him. A servo-skull is whirring over his shoulder, the fingers of his augmented hand are drumming over a pile of papers, and the lenses of the magnifying implant are gleaming with attention.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok is at your service."

Janris Danrok, at your service."

Janris Danrok, at your service."

languages.text: {n}这穿着奢华衣服的肥胖男性有些困难地向你鞠了一躬。他带着植入物的手指敲打着文件袋，伺服头骨在他的肩膀上呼呼作响。他通过放大器植入物的镜头，带着专注的兴趣看着你。{/n}“您好，{mf|大人|大人}！詹里斯·丹罗克，愿为您效劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}这穿着奢华衣服的肥胖男性有些困难地向你鞠了一躬。他带着植入物的手指敲打着文件袋，伺服头骨在他的肩膀上呼呼作响。他通过放大器植入物的镜头，带着专注的兴趣看着你。{/n}“您好，{mf|大人|大人}！詹里斯·丹罗克，愿为您效劳。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre corpulento con ropas lujosas se inclina ante ti con cierta dificultad. Un servocráneo flota junto a su hombro mientras tamborilea con los dedos en el fardo de papeles que sujeta. Te mira con interés a través de su implante.{/n} «¡Saludos, mil{mf|ord|ady}! Soy Janris Danrok, a su servicio».
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre corpulento con ropas lujosas se inclina ante ti con cierta dificultad. Un servocráneo flota junto a su hombro mientras tamborilea con los dedos en el fardo de papeles que sujeta. Te mira con interés a través de su implante.{/n} «¡Saludos, mil{mf|ord|ady}! Soy Janris Danrok, a su servicio».

languages.text: {n}豪奢な服に身を包んだ太った男が、難なくあなたにお辞儀をする。彼の肩の上でサーヴォスカルが回転すると同時に、拡張された手が持っている書類の束を叩く。拡大インプラントのレンズを通して、彼はあなたをじっくりと見つめる。{/n}「ごきげんよう、{mf|陛下|陛下}！ジャンリス・ダンロックと申します。どうぞお見知りおきを」
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}豪奢な服に身を包んだ太った男が、難なくあなたにお辞儀をする。彼の方の上でサーヴォスカルが回転すると同時に、拡張された手が持っている書類の束を叩く。拡大インプラントのレンズを通して、彼はあなたをじっくりと見つめる。{/n}「ごきげんよう、{mf|陛下|陛下}！私はジャンリス・ダンロック。どうぞお見知りおきを」

languages.text: {n}Der korpulente Mann in prächtiger Kleidung verbeugt sich vor dir, nicht ganz ohne Schwierigkeiten. Ein Servoschädel schwirrt über seiner Schulter, während die Finger seiner augmentierten Hand gegen das Papierbündel trommeln, das er in der Hand hält, und er betrachtet dich aufmerksam und interessiert durch die Linse seines Vergrößerungsimplantats.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Janris Danrok, zu Euren Diensten."
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der korpulente Mann in prächtiger Kleidung verbeugt sich vor dir, nicht ganz ohne Schwierigkeiten. Ein Servoschädel schwirrt über seiner Schulter, während die Finger seiner augmentierten Hand gegen das Papierbündel trommeln, das er in der Hand hält, und er betrachtet dich aufmerksam und interessiert durch die Linse seines Vergrößerungsimplantats.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Janris Danrok, zu Euren Diensten."

languages.text: {n}L'individu corpulent et richement vêtu s'incline devant vous, non sans mal. Un servocrâne vrombit au-dessus de son épaule, tandis que ses doigts tambourinent sur la liasse de papiers qu'il tient dans sa main augmentée. Il vous observe avec intérêt au travers de la lentille de son implant grossissant.{/n} « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie ! Janris Danrok, pour vous servir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'individu corpulent et richement vêtu s'incline devant vous, non sans mal. Il vous observe avec intérêt au travers de la lentille de son implant grossissant.{/n} « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie ! Janris Danrok, pour vous servir. »

languages.text: {n}Fazlasıyla fiyakalı kıyafetler içindeki şişman adam, önünde ıkına sıkına eğiliyor. Omzunun üzerinde bir hizmelet vızıldarken ogmentli elinin parmakları, tuttuğu kâğıt demetine tıkır tıkır vuruyor. Adam, büyüteçli implantının merceğinden sana pürdikkat bakıyor.{/n} "Selamlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bendeniz Janris Danrok, emrinize amadeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The corpulent man in lavish clothes bows before you, not without difficulty. A servo-skull whirrs over his shoulder while the fingers of his augmented hand drum against the sheaf of papers he is holding, and he regards you with attentive interest through the lens of his magnifying implant.{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Janris Danrok, at your service."
